abstract: The only concrete buyout offers Telecom Italia has received are from AT&T and a Latin American company.
snippet: The only concrete buyout offers Telecom Italia has received are from AT&T and a Latin American company.
lead_paragraph: MILAN, April 8 — It has all the makings of a standard Italian financial melodrama, with the usual cast of characters.

headline.main: Outrage! A Nation’s Phones May End in Foreign Hands
headline.print_headline: Outrage! A Nation’s Phones May End in Foreign Hands
